matrix-project.description: Creates the Embedded Gaming VDK's installers

hudson.plugins.copyartifact.BuildSelecto.name: BUILD_SELECTOR_iCafe_VDK_BUILD
hudson.plugins.copyartifact.BuildSelecto.description: The iCafe_VDK_Build whose artifacts need to be copied.

scm.projectOptions: allwrite clobber nocompress unlocked nomodtime rmdir

hudson.tasks.BatchFile.command:
@echo off
::- VDK_iCafe_sources_1.0-0.18-Alpha.7z ::- Extract MajorNumber, MinorNumber, BuildNumber, SubMinor Number and Milestone from the above
setlocal enabledelayedexpansion
::- Get the archive filename on which we will operate VDK_iCafe_sources_v120_1.0-0.61-Beta.7z for /r %%i in (VDK_%V%_sources_%T%_*.%ARCHIVE_EXTENSION%) do ( set ARCHIVE_FILENAME=%%~ni )
echo ARCHIVE_FILENAME: !ARCHIVE_FILENAME!
::- Split it on "." for /f "tokens=1,2,3 delims=." %%a in ('echo !ARCHIVE_FILENAME!') do ( set VDK_MAJOR_NUMBER_FULL=%%a set VDK_MINOR_NUMBER_FULL=%%b set VDK_BUILD_NUMBER_FULL=%%c )
echo VDK_MAJOR_NUMBER_FULL: !VDK_MAJOR_NUMBER_FULL! echo VDK_MINOR_NUMBER_FULL: !VDK_MINOR_NUMBER_FULL! echo VDK_BUILD_NUMBER_FULL: !VDK_BUILD_NUMBER_FULL!
::- Now Split the VDK_MAJOR_NUMBER_FULL using "_" for /f "tokens=5 delims=_" %%a in ('echo !VDK_MAJOR_NUMBER_FULL!') do ( set VDK_MAJOR_NUMBER=%%a )
::- Now Split the VDK_MINOR_NUMBER_FULL using "-" for /f "tokens=1,2 delims=-" %%a in ('echo !VDK_MINOR_NUMBER_FULL!') do ( set VDK_MINOR_NUMBER=%%a set VDK_SUBMINOR_NUMBER=%%b )
::- Now Split the VDK_BUILD_NUMBER_FULL using "-" for /f "tokens=1,2 delims=-" %%a in ('echo !VDK_BUILD_NUMBER_FULL!') do ( set VDK_BUILD_NUMBER=%%a set VDK_MILESTONE=%%b )
echo VDK_MAJOR_NUMBER: !VDK_MAJOR_NUMBER! echo VDK_MINOR_NUMBER: !VDK_MINOR_NUMBER! echo VDK_SUBMINOR_NUMBER: !VDK_SUBMINOR_NUMBER! echo VDK_BUILD_NUMBER: !VDK_BUILD_NUMBER! echo VDK_MILESTONE: !VDK_MILESTONE!
set ENVIRON_FILE=%WORKSPACE%\Environ.props echo VDK_MAJOR_NUMBER=!VDK_MAJOR_NUMBER! > %ENVIRON_FILE% echo VDK_MINOR_NUMBER=!VDK_MINOR_NUMBER! >> %ENVIRON_FILE% echo VDK_SUBMINOR_NUMBER=!VDK_SUBMINOR_NUMBER! >> %ENVIRON_FILE% echo VDK_BUILD_NUMBER=!VDK_BUILD_NUMBER! >> %ENVIRON_FILE% echo VDK_MILESTONE=!VDK_MILESTONE! >> %ENVIRON_FILE% echo VDK_PRODUCT_VERSION=!VDK_MAJOR_NUMBER!.!VDK_MINOR_NUMBER!.!VDK_BUILD_NUMBER!.!BUILD_NUMBER! >> %ENVIRON_FILE%
endlocal

@echo off setlocal
::--------------------------------------------------------------------- set ISM=%WORKSPACE%\Installers\windows\VDK.ism set COMMMON_MM_DIR=%ProgramFiles(x86)%\Common Files\Merge Modules
::- Before creating the packages, we need to update the name of the MSI directly in the .ism file echo [INFO][%~n0%~x0]Using PERL bin: %PERL% echo [INFO][%~n0%~x0]XERCES_VERSION: %XERCES_VERSION% echo [INFO][%~n0%~x0]CODEXL_VERSION: %CODEXL_VERSION%
%PERL% -pi.bak -e "s!AMD_%VDK_FULL_NAME%_VDK_Setup!AMD_%VDK_FULL_NAME%_VDK_Setup-%VDK_ARTIFACTDISPLAY_NUMBER%!g;" "%ISM%"
set SAMPLES_DIR=%WORKSPACE%\VDK\%VDK_FULL_NAME%\%VDK_PRODUCT_VERSION_DISPLAY%\samples set BIN_DIR=%SAMPLES_DIR%\bin
move /Y "%BIN_DIR%" %WORKSPACE%
echo [INFO][%~n0%~x0]Executing: "%ISCMDBLD%" -a %V% -r F -v -x -p "%ISM%" -o "%COMMMON_MM_DIR%" -y %VDK_PRODUCT_VERSION% -z VDK_PRODUCT_VERSION_DISPLAY="%VDK_PRODUCT_VERSION_DISPLAY%" -z VDK_FULL_NAME="%VDK_FULL_NAME%" -z ProductName="AMD %VDK_FULL_DISPLAY_NAME% VDK %VDK_PRODUCT_VERSION_DISPLAY%" -z EG_VDK_DIR_VERSION="%VDK_PRODUCT_VERSION_DISPLAY%" -z ADL_VERSION=%ADL_VERSION% -z XERCES_VERSION=%XERCES_VERSION% -z CODEXL_VERSION=%CODEXL_VERSION% -l CertPath=%SystemDrive%\cert -l x86Folder="%WORKSPACE%\bin\Win32" -l x86_64Folder="%WORKSPACE%\bin\x64" -l RootFolder="%WORKSPACE%\VDK\%VDK_FULL_NAME%"
"%ISCMDBLD%" -a %V% -r F -v -x -p "%ISM%" -o "%COMMMON_MM_DIR%" -y %VDK_PRODUCT_VERSION% -z VDK_PRODUCT_VERSION_DISPLAY="%VDK_PRODUCT_VERSION_DISPLAY%" -z VDK_FULL_NAME="%VDK_FULL_NAME%" -z ProductName="AMD %VDK_FULL_DISPLAY_NAME% VDK %VDK_PRODUCT_VERSION_DISPLAY%" -z EG_VDK_DIR_VERSION="%VDK_PRODUCT_VERSION_DISPLAY%" -z ADL_VERSION=%ADL_VERSION% -z XERCES_VERSION=%XERCES_VERSION% -z CODEXL_VERSION=%CODEXL_VERSION% -l CertPath=%SystemDrive%\cert -l x86Folder="%WORKSPACE%\bin\Win32" -l x86_64Folder="%WORKSPACE%\bin\x64" -l RootFolder="%WORKSPACE%\VDK\%VDK_FULL_NAME%"
endlocal

hudson.plugins.emailext.ExtendedEmailPub.defaultContent:
CAS Build System  |  Update preferences  |  Unsubscribe

$VDK_FULL_NAME VDK Package Notification (Installers)

STATUS

The CAS Build System finished building the $PROJECT_NAME

Status: $BUILD_STATUS
BuildNumber: $VDK_ARTIFACTDISPLAY_NUMBER
Originator: $CAUSE
Changes: $CHANGES
Download URL: $JOB_URL
Build Console: $BUILD_URL/console

AMD | AMD Central
